statements: INSERT INTO Recipes (recipe_id, recipe_name, origin_country, creator, ingredients, cooking_instructions) VALUES (1, 'Spaghetti Carbonara', 'Italy', 'Giulia', 'Spaghetti, Pancetta, Eggs, Parmesan Cheese, Black Pepper', '1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy. 3. Beat eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese. 4. Combine cooked spaghetti with pancetta, add egg mixture, and mix well. 5. Serve hot.');

INSERT INTO Recipes (recipe_id, recipe_name, origin_country, creator, ingredients, cooking_instructions) VALUES (1, 'Spaghetti Carbonara', 'Italy', 'Giovanni', 'Pasta, Eggs, Pancetta, Parmesan Cheese', '1. Cook spaghetti until al dente. 2. Fry pancetta until crispy. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine all ingredients. 5. Serve hot.'),

INSERT INTO Recipes (recipe_name, origin_country, creator, ingredients, recipe_id, cooking_instructions) VALUES ('Chicken Curry', 'India', 'Priya', 'Chicken, Curry Paste, Coconut Milk, Vegetables', 2, '1. Cook chicken with curry paste. 2. Add coconut milk. 3. Simmer with vegetables. 4. Serve with rice.'),

INSERT INTO Recipes (recipe_id, ingredients, cooking_instructions, recipe_name, origin_country, creator) VALUES (3, 'Beef, Tomatoes, Onions, Garlic, Spices', '1. Brown beef. 2. Saute onions and garlic. 3. Add tomatoes and spices. 4. Simmer until tender.', 'Beef Stew', 'USA', 'Mary'),

INSERT INTO Recipes (creator, origin_country, recipe_id, recipe_name, cooking_instructions, ingredients) VALUES ('Juan', 'Mexico', 4, 'Tacos', '1. Cook meat with spices. 2. Warm tortillas. 3. Assemble tacos with meat and toppings.', 'Beef, Tortillas, Salsa, Guacamole'),

INSERT INTO Recipes VALUES (5, 'Caesar Salad', 'USA', 'Sarah', 'Romaine Lettuce, Croutons, Caesar Dressing, Parmesan Cheese', '1. Toss lettuce with dressing. 2. Add croutons and cheese. 3. Serve as a side salad.');
